text_block_list.text:
With the summer training camp approaching, we were 
currently putting together a training program for it.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I have a favor to ask, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Could we schedule in a two… no, two to three hour 
block of time after training on this day of the camp?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: To be clear, it's for both of us, not only me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……It's… to fulfill a scheduled objective. And, umm… Right, I need you to be there for it.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Is that acceptable…?

That was an uncharacteristically vague request for her 
to make, but seeing as she seemed pretty tense about it, 
I decided to not press her further and agreed…

Later, after finishing our scheduled training 
on a certain day of the camp ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Fwooh… fhaah…
choice_data_list: Alright, let's call it a day!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes… thank you for your time. By the way… umm…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
You've kept those two to three hours 
I requested open… haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Then please meet me at the shrine in 1 hour and 35 minutes. 
I have a few preparations to make, so I will see you later…

That amount of time later, therefore, 
I made my way to the shrine.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Very punctual, just as I expect from you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Are you a fan of festivals, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
This summer festival is very lively, isn't it? 
The whole area smells delicious as well… I'm getting hungry.
choice_data_list: You wanted to try this, huh?
You wanted to try this, huh?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
My roommate told me about it before. That there's a traditional 
summer festival held close by the training camp location.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I had an interest in Japan's festivals from early on, 
when I decided to study abroad. It's fortunate that 
we had time after training today…
choice_data_list: You could have just told me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……I didn't mean to keep it a secret. 
I just… wasn't sure when to ask.
choice_data_list: I do have to say, I'm a little surprised.
I do have to say, I'm a little surprised.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Are you surprised… that I have an interest in festivals? 
My roommate said a similar thing.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
To quote her more precisely; I "give off a cool impression" 
and seem like I "would like more quiet places", apparently.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
But Germany has something called a carnival. The rowdiness 
of such an event can't be compared to a festival like this. 
It really is what you might call a boisterous spectacle.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
And I… don't mind that atmosphere of intoxicating fun 
with smiles all around in the slightest.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That is to say, I came fully prepared to enjoy the wonderful 
culture of a Japanese summer festival. So come, let's get going.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Did you know that candied apples exist in Germany too? 
During the Christmas market season, you can find apples 
coated in bright blue colors ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah… Trainer, look, they're having a bon dance over there. The culture here is really enjoyable.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: All those people look like they're having so much fun… Hm? Umm, are they… waving us closer? Do they want us to…?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Trainer…!?
I had a great time with Eishin Flash at the summer festival.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……! Oh no, it's gotten really late already…!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The fireworks will start in 3 minutes. We need to hurry up 
and find a spot to watch… although we likely won't make 
it anymore…
choice_data_list: Can we not see them from here?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
We can… but according to what I looked up beforehand, 
we won't be able to see them in full here.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That's why I had found a nice place, roughly a 10 minute 
walk away. …I could make it there in time without much 
effort, surely, but…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: But Trainer, you…
choice_data_list: I care that you get to enjoy the fireworks!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……I forgot my most important objective.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
We don't need to move after all. I will change 
my plan to watching the fireworks from here.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, it's fine. Because…
(Fyuuuuu…)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah……

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Wunderschön…… 
It really is… a pretty sight.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……I'm glad we stayed here, so that I could 
accomplish my first and foremost objective.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Which was "to spend a pleasant time with Trainer"…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
This time right now… is a very pleasant one. 
Do you think so too?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Trainer. Me too, I… firmly feel the same way.
